metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

properties.description: Island data connector with template version 3.0.0

connectorUiConfig.title: Island Enterprise Browser Admin Audit (Polling CCP)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Island](https://www.island.io) Admin connector provides the capability to ingest Island Admin Audit logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

customs.name: Island API Key
customs.description: An Island API key is required.

instructionSteps.description:
Provide the Island API URL and Key.  API URL is https://management.island.io/api/external/v1/adminActions for US or https://eu.management.island.io/api/external/v1/adminActions for EU.
  Generate the API Key in the Management Console under Settings > API.
instructionSteps.title: Connect Island to Microsoft Sentinel

properties.description: @{workbookKey=IslandUserActivityOverview; logoFileName=island.svg; description=This workbook provides a view into the activities of users while using the Island Enterprise Browser.; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Island User Activity Overview; templateRelativePath=IslandUserActivityOverview.json; subtitle=; provider=Island}.description

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Island Enterprise Browser solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest events for both User Activity and Admin Audit via API using Microsoft Sentinel CCP Data Connectors.

Data Connectors: 2, Workbooks: 2

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
